name: chinoiserie
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a style of art, furniture, decoration, etc. that has Chinese or East Asian influences in the design. It was popular in Europe in the 18th century: Her most treasured piece of chinoiserie was a porcelain vase. They bought a $50,000 English chinoiserie desk for the living room.
Arra Vais/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesthe extravagant chinoiserie of the so-called Japanese Salon at the Villa Hugel in Vienna He had a notable collection of chinoiserie. A Meissen Chinoiserie table-bell from circa 1730 was sold to a private collector for £70,000.This is our Chinese bedroom, done in the chinoiserie style.
